name: part_002
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs 'Hana no Tou' on stage.
A special medley PV for 'Talking Box (Dirty Pop Remix)' featuring various clips and on-screen text.
MC section where Sakamata Chloe thanks the audience and talks about the setlist.

subtitles.original: …さえも不都合　今は
subtitles.english: ...even that is inconvenient, so now

subtitles.original: 書き換えて
subtitles.english: rewrite it.

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: If I end up holding your hand,

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: in this city that knows no loneliness,

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰って来ることはできないでしょう
subtitles.english: I probably won't be able to return ever again.

subtitles.original: いくらでも迷いながら
subtitles.english: While getting lost as much as it takes,

subtitles.original: 光も影も見に行こう
subtitles.english: let's go see both the light and the shadows.

subtitles.original: 歌って聴かせて　この話の続き
subtitles.english: Sing and let me hear the rest of this story.

subtitles.original: 連れて行って見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me away to stars I've never seen before.

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Connecting the ends of the world together.

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Connecting the ends of the world together.

subtitles.original: TALKING BOX REMIX
subtitles.english: TALKING BOX REMIX

subtitles.original: WE CAN GROW UP
subtitles.english: WE CAN GROW UP

subtitles.original: CALLING NIGHT
subtitles.english: CALLING NIGHT

subtitles.original: DANCE WITH ME / DANCE WITH YOU
subtitles.english: DANCE WITH ME / DANCE WITH YOU

subtitles.original: COUNT DOWN
subtitles.english: COUNT DOWN

subtitles.original: SHUTTLE DOWN
subtitles.english: SHUTTLE DOWN

subtitles.original: TO BE CONTINUED...
subtitles.english: TO BE CONTINUED...

subtitles.original: イェーイ！皆、今日お祝いしに来てくれて
subtitles.english: Yeah! Everyone, thank you so much for

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: coming to celebrate today!

subtitles.original: イェイイェイイェイイェイ！どうだった？
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay yay! How was it?

subtitles.original: どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was it?

subtitles.original: なんかさ、一周年のときよりは緊張しなかった。
subtitles.english: You know, I wasn't as nervous as I was during my first anniversary.

subtitles.original: 何だろうな、いっぱい練習したし。
subtitles.english: I wonder why... I practiced a lot.

subtitles.original: 直前までリハもやってたし、いっぱい練習したし。
subtitles.english: I was doing rehearsals until right before, and I practiced a lot.

subtitles.original: 前と、でもそうか、条件変わんないか。
subtitles.english: The conditions haven't really changed since before... wait, I guess they haven't.

subtitles.original: 変わんないけどなんかすごい緊張しなかったです。
subtitles.english: They haven't changed, but for some reason, I wasn't nervous at all.

subtitles.original: イェイイェイイェイイェイ！どうだった？
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay yay! How was it?

subtitles.original: 良かった？ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Was it good? Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: ちょっと「ラブレター」は、みんなに対してね、初めましてっていう
subtitles.english: For 'Love Letter', it was about that feeling of 'nice to meet you'

subtitles.original: その一曲目ってので「初めまして」っていう気持ちとかね。
subtitles.english: since it was the first song.

subtitles.original: あとみんなに、こういう思いがあるんだよっていうのを伝えたいなと思って選びました。
subtitles.english: I chose it because I wanted to tell everyone that I have these feelings.

subtitles.original: そして二曲目の「花の塔」もですね、非常に可愛らしい曲で、
subtitles.english: And the second song, 'Hana no Tou', is also a very lovely song.

subtitles.original: 沙花叉めっちゃリコリコ好きでさ、この曲超好きなんだけど。
subtitles.english: Sakamata loves LycoReco, and I really love this song.

subtitles.original: これもね、なんかみんなと一緒にね、走り出すじゃないけど、
subtitles.english: With this one too, it's like we're starting to run together...

subtitles.original: これからもね、傍にいたいなっていう気持ちも込めてしました。
subtitles.english: I put in my feelings of wanting to be by your side from now on as well.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!
